name: Slashpunk
description:
WARNING! This game contains flashing lights. No, you can't turn them off they're a big part of the game.

Slashpunk is a casual game inspired by Fruit Ninja and Undertale. 

During fight, you have two phases:

ATTACK PHASE: The game starts in Attack Phase, use your cursor and  hover over bots, who are your enemies. If you do enough damage, it dies, and will and some time before the upcoming:

DEFENSE PHASE: Now the enemies attack you! Your cursor will have a Red Circle, and dodge the Blue Attacks, if you touch one, you lose a heart, and if you have no hearts left, you die, and try again.

Creator Notes: Thanks for playing the game, if you'd like to, you can help not just with the money, but also by leaving a positive comment. Also don't worry, it's all a demo. New levels will be in the future.
